title: Developing a Brand New Content Platform in Seven Months
abstract: Springer, a market-leading scientific publisher, has amassed a collection of over 5.5 million documents, but when it decided to create a new offering for the corporate market it had only seven months to go from green field to live site. This talk will explore the technology decisions and agile development process that enabled Springer to launch a vastly redesigned, tailored product platform using MarkLogic as the basis.
